entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7 except minus 1 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries near the Saskatchewan border early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 1 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
